name: The Metro Station Incident
description:
- INSPIRED BY "PARK LANE" by Joseph Whitehead-

https://drunkardwolf.itch.io/park-lane

The Metro Station Incident is a short indie horror game about a man waiting for the train after a bad day at work, alone in the metro station...

- This is my first game, feel free to give me some feedback :D

Controls:

WASD  -  Move

Mouse -  Look

E - Interact with objects
